channel.title: attackNPCSWithin(377, 39, 0)?

item.title: attackNPCSWithin(377, 39, 0)?
item.dc:creator: @SeySayux SeySayux
item.description:
@SeySayux wrote:

startAnimation: starts an emote
attackNPCSwithin : will attack all these npc’s that are 0 squares from you away, with anim 377 and 39 damage
next, that means your lowest hit can be 0, and your higest 29
it will add half of hitdiff from your hp (note: it doesn’t substract it, you actually get more hp!)
then it checks if your new hp is higher than your max hp, if it is, it will be set to your max hp

Read full topic

item.title: attackNPCSWithin(377, 39, 0)?
item.dc:creator: @jonaske jonaske
item.description:
@jonaske wrote:

startAnimation(1979); attackNPCSWithin(377, 39, 0); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(29); NewHP += hitDiff / 2; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); }

this is the code what means attackNPCSWithin(377, 39, 0) ???
and the other does it means if my hit is 20 : 2 = 10 so if my hp lvl > then 10 then it will be 25/99 if i had first 15/99?
